mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN salary_archives_info saDoc ON saDoc.id = a.SA_DOC_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM salary_data a
1=1 AND a.id > 0

SELECT
FROM salary_data a
1=1 AND a.id > 0
ORDER BY ${order}
ORDER BY a.ID ASC

select sd.* from salary_data sd left join salary_archives_info sai on sai.id = sd.sa_doc_id left join salary_batch sb on sb.id = sd.sa_batch_id where sai.employee_no = #{employeeNo} and sb.tax_month >= #{year} and sb.tax_month <= #{year1}

select sd.* from salary_data sd left join salary_archives_info sai on sai.id = sd.sa_doc_id left join salary_batch sb on sb.id = sd.sa_batch_id where sai.employee_no = #{employeeNo} and sb.tax_month = #{taxMonth} and sd.is_del = '0' and sb.is_del = '0' and sb.is_verify = '1'

SELECT
FROM salary_data a
1=1 AND a.id > 0
AND saDoc.employee_name like '%${employeeName}%'
AND saDoc.id_card_no like '%${idCardNo}%'
AND a.sa_batch_id = '${saBatchId}'
ORDER BY ${order}
ORDER BY a.ID ASC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
